titles.title: There is a candle (carry your candle)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There is a candle in every soul newline Some brightly burning some dark and cold newline There is a spirit who brings the fire newline Ignites a candle and makes his home

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Carry your candle run to the darkness newline Seek out the hopeless confused and torn newline Hold out your candle for all to see it newline Take your candle and go light your world

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Frustrated brother see how he's tried to newline Light his own candle some other way newline See now our sister she's been robbed and lied to newline And still holds a candle without a flame

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Carry your candle run to the darkness newline Seek out the lonely the tired and worn newline Hold out your candle for all to see it newline Take your candle and go light your world

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: We are a family whose hearts are blazing newline We raise our candles and light up the sky newline Praying to our father in the name of Jesus newline Make us a beacon in darkest hours

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Carry your candle run to the darkness newline Seek out the helpless deceived and poor newline Hold out your candle for all to see it newline Take your candle and go light your world newline Take your candle and go light your world
